44e83b77-9fb4-5086-a8c3-fbb99fc2a1cc.title: ITP approved for use by: Babak Rudd

4d3c616d-1281-58b6-ba3d-c7d49b2fda36.title: Collate: Precast Quality Assurance Documentation so it can be uploaded into Teambinder (don't attach it here)

f7ce0ed9-a56f-56a0-97b3-fd3914f0631d.title: Acceptance Criteria - Precast supplier is required to provide the following Quality Assurance documentation for each element, typically this consists of:

5e6e165e-da95-5d9a-8f3b-66f0865b174d.title: vii. Record of dimensional measurements to demonstrate compliance with dimensional tolerances of precast shown in Cl.610.47

deb797bc-dc15-57e8-ae58-bab00ce84dce.title: i. Certificate of Compliance / Birth Certificate

0624a86c-ec74-5ed6-a184-b5eac3f6c073.title: Reference Documents - FH Quality Management Plan

6aabe3ac-c577-5848-b6a0-357f749b88a7.title: Acceptance Criteria - Details of the joint sealant used to seal around the precast element to be submitted for review to the Nominated Authority.

be557c53-a898-510e-b750-d7d54f530715.title: Acceptance Criteria - Survey activities undertaken to ensure and validate that all Works meet level and location requirements within the tolerances as per Cl.610.47 as applicable to the element.

502f4249-bb80-5fef-ad6c-7038bce64d33.title: Note: Any clashes should be levered out of the way using a crow-bar or similar - avoid hitting with a hammer on bars with a tight radius.

02465ca1-b2b1-58f5-a043-2d8c0681e6aa.title: If the precast elements are being connected with a stitch pour, mark any clashes from protruding reinforcement with the planned locations from the precast.

edfbf0b5-0b4d-558b-a139-c3d193657a96.title: Backing rod should be compressed enough to prevent movement during the concrete or grout pouring activities.

84b37c1d-733d-5a17-b5b2-8240a82bb03a.title: Acceptance Criteria - Adhere any sealing strips, backing rod or bitumen impregnated fibre-board into the positions shown on the IFC Drawings or where grout or concrete ingress will affect the end use (such as around conduits).

3cde02c6-fc3e-55a6-9677-82c162985d8d.title: Frequency - Where applicable, each installation location

meta.name: 3.2 - Sealing Strips, Backing Rod & Bitumen Board

d89ede96-b98a-5e18-b34f-1dae8f186dd8.title: Acceptance Criteria - General inspection of precast elements for defects including cracks, damage, exposed reinforcement and where applicable, damage to coatings.

20b9b180-1eb9-5e5e-abe9-130b3c4ec3ef.title: Elements shall have unique identification and orientation marked (if applicable).

43c7c78d-86f4-5331-8d01-62004bc16fc3.title: Complete: Materials Inspection Checklist in ConQA

4ecc14d8-09ee-5a1e-a50b-590c19f82e1e.title: Confirm that the cast in lifters (anchors or loops) are the correct size and orientation as per the Precast Lifting Design (they should be clearly labelled on the end to be connected to).

9ee21609-5ae6-5793-ae86-ca1ff7707283.title: Acceptance Criteria - Unless otherwise specified, precast elements shall be lifted using the lifting points provided and supported with the top surface uppermost at all times.

bdab3186-9977-5d0a-b52d-6d2fc43aeadd.title: The nominal gap between elements is as per the IFC Drawings.

e57a4dd7-857e-56c8-8ce3-3fea3b17f595.title: Acceptance Criteria - Precast elements shall be placed onto the bearing shims and not released from the crane until sufficiently braced or restrained by bolted connection, in accordance with the approved temporary works design and/or IFC drawings.

28b03f3c-85b3-59e6-a6f3-6b9d9c2feaca.title: Make any adjustments necessary by lifting the unit and adding/removing shims or adjusting the levelling bolts so that alignment between units, overall height and position remains in tolerance.

3e8994c1-50b5-5c51-aa4d-f9e835cbc36b.title: Acceptance Criteria - Place a continuous length of 3mm galvanised wire or high-strength nylon draw string so that it can be terminated at any junction boxes.

d0eb0981-8af1-5cb4-9fca-4532bc5db2e1.title: Record: The final location of each precast element, showing individual ID and date installed onto the Red-line Drawings or Survey Report

da47798d-6817-503c-8127-1ce97702f215.title: Acceptance Criteria - All manufactured precast elements shall be traced from the completion of manufacture to their final location by a unique identification number.

c6b7316e-e594-5e02-b602-35c16bb17cfe.title: Acceptance Criteria - The gap between each precast element or at interfaces with other structures should be sealed with an the approved sealant on top of a backing rod.

dbb8c5ea-2f09-5c3e-afae-3c965e53368d.title: Record of conformity - Grout Pedestals & Bearings ITP

d6d3b942-325b-506e-93b5-be7ca21562fd.title: Record of conformity - Grout Pedestals & Bearings ITP

68224983-b7c6-512a-927a-3d04593fb6ee.title: Acceptance Criteria - Grout shall be poured at connections between elements and/or in the gap between the bottom of the precast element and top of the bridge deck/foundation following full sealant application.

e35f0585-f329-5dd8-b887-dca63a5e8079.title: Complete: Steel Barrier Fencing (Supply & Installation) ITP.

b1e67901-5c95-5a59-8f8f-1d2b98e5ebed.title: Record of conformity - Structural Steel Barrier Rail (Supply & Installation) ITP

74c6babf-89a5-56ab-ac8b-ac19ba7a4b33.title: Acceptance Criteria - Provide record of dimensional measurements to demonstrate concrete members comply with tolerances in Cl.610.47

19eb3623-3f7a-548e-a5cf-777b37eb9b91.title: Acceptance Criteria - Ensure that any NCRs pertaining to the lot / element / Work area that this ITP covers, have been closed in CAMs.

ae89b3a8-0c6f-563a-a134-d286c28b5dad.title: Frequency - Once, prior to closure of this lot / element / Work area

e86b5a82-27eb-5cf1-902b-48de354b938a.title: Reference Documents - FH Quality Management Plan

3843bbf6-31cb-5444-a299-d5dd40006ac0.title: The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the Fulton Hogan's Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.

db3bb910-6f34-5928-8df0-fb6ef66a5d8c.title: Is the relevant RFI attached to the Lot?

ba3b132b-6801-5791-8bef-0b6187ca9c37.title: Is the relevant NCR attached to the Lot?

292e86b0-3323-537b-97ff-b930c549d919.title: Are any relevant Mails/ Transmittals attached to the Lot?
